headline.main: New York Denies Critical Permit for Natural Gas Pipeline
headline.print_headline: New York Denies Critical Permit for Natural Gas Pipeline

docs.snippet: New York environmental regulators have rejected a critical permit needed for a major natural gas pipeline project, saying the project fails to meet standards that protect hundreds of streams, wetlands and other water resources in its path....
docs.lead_paragraph: New York environmental regulators have rejected a critical permit needed for a major natural gas pipeline project, saying the project fails to meet standards that protect hundreds of streams, wetlands and other water resources in its path.

headline.main: New Orleans Eyes New Gun-Control Measures to Stem Violence
headline.print_headline: New Orleans Eyes New Gun-Control Measures to Stem Violence

docs.snippet: The mayor of New Orleans, a city plagued by murders and shootings, hopes to stem the violence with new gun-control measures, including a requirement that stolen and lost guns are promptly reported to police....
docs.lead_paragraph: The mayor of New Orleans, a city plagued by murders and shootings, hopes to stem the violence with new gun-control measures, including a requirement that stolen and lost guns are promptly reported to police.

headline.main: Arizona Triple Homicide Victims Were From Washington State
headline.print_headline: Arizona Triple Homicide Victims Were From Washington State

docs.snippet: Three homicide victims found dead in trailers on a desert property in western Arizona were identified Friday as Washington state residents, including a married couple about to return home....
docs.lead_paragraph: Three homicide victims found dead in trailers on a desert property in western Arizona were identified Friday as Washington state residents, including a married couple about to return home.

headline.main: North Carolina Republicans Criticize Obama Over Transgender Law
headline.print_headline: North Carolina Republicans Criticize Obama Over Transgender Law

docs.snippet: North Carolina Republicans criticized President Barack Obama on Friday after the president told a news conference in London the state's law on transgender bathroom use was wrong and should be overturned....
docs.lead_paragraph: North Carolina Republicans criticized President Barack Obama on Friday after the president told a news conference in London the state's law on transgender bathroom use was wrong and should be overturned.

headline.main: A Mindful Path to Environmental Progress in a Noisy Media Environment

headline.print_headline: Stewart's Stormy Return Garners Support of Fellow Drivers

docs.snippet: Three-time NASCAR champion Tony Stewart returned to the track on Friday for the first time this season, and several drivers said they support his right to raise questions about safety concerns....

headline.main: Steele Moves Three Ahead at Weather-Hit Texas Open
headline.print_headline: Steele Moves Three Ahead at Weather-Hit Texas Open

docs.snippet: Brendan Steele took advantage of relatively calm conditions at one of his favorite venues to earn a three-shot lead in the second round of the weather-disrupted Texas Open in San Antonio on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brendan Steele took advantage of relatively calm conditions at one of his favorite venues to earn a three-shot lead in the second round of the weather-disrupted Texas Open in San Antonio on Friday.
